Finance.title: Save £5,000 in 52 Weeks
Finance.description: A structured savings plan to help you save £5,000 over the course of a year with weekly tasks and check-ins.

tasks.title: Set up a dedicated savings account
tasks.description: Open a high-interest savings account specifically for this goal

tasks.title: Create a weekly budget
tasks.description: Plan your weekly expenses and identify areas to cut back

tasks.title: Set up automatic transfers
tasks.description: Arrange for £96 to be automatically transferred to your savings account each week

tasks.title: Track your first week's expenses
tasks.description: Record all your expenses for the first week to identify spending patterns

tasks.title: Weekly savings check-in
tasks.description: Review your progress and adjust your budget as needed

tasks.title: Monthly savings review
tasks.description: Analyze your monthly savings progress and make adjustments to your plan

tasks.title: Quarterly financial check-up
tasks.description: Comprehensive review of your savings progress and financial health

tasks.title: Contact creditors for better rates
tasks.description: Call your creditors to negotiate lower interest rates

tasks.title: Set up automatic payments
tasks.description: Arrange for automatic payments to ensure you never miss a payment

tasks.title: Weekly debt check-in
tasks.description: Review your progress and stay motivated

tasks.title: Monthly debt progress review
tasks.description: Analyze your monthly debt reduction progress and adjust your plan

tasks.title: Week 2: Run 1 - 3km easy pace
